00025 Analyzer::Analyzer()
00026     : options_(OPTION_TYPE_NUM),
00027     posDelimiter_(DEFAULT_POS_DELIMITER),
00028     wordDelimiter_(DEFAULT_WORD_DELIMITER)
00029 {
00030     options_[OPTION_TYPE_POS_TAGGING] = 1; // tag part-of-speech tags defaultly
00031     options_[OPTION_TYPE_NBEST] = 1; // set the default number of candidate results of runWithSentence()
00032     options_[OPTION_TYPE_POS_FORMAT_ALPHABET] = 0; // disable output part-of-speech tags in alphabet format defaultly, use Japanese format instead.
00033     options_[OPTION_TYPE_POS_FULL_CATEGORY] = 0; // disable output part-of-speech tags in Japanese full category format
00034     options_[OPTION_TYPE_COMBINE_NOUN_AFFIX] = 1; // enable combining affix into nouns defaultly
00035 }

00038 {
00039 }

00041 void Analyzer::setOption(OptionType nOption, double nValue)
00042 {
00043     // check nbest value range
00044     if(nOption == OPTION_TYPE_NBEST && nValue < 1)
00045     {
00046         return;
00047     }
00048 
00049     options_[nOption] = nValue;
00050 }
00051 
00052 double Analyzer::getOption(OptionType nOption) const
00053 {
00054     return options_[nOption];
00055 }
